channel.title: Best way to stay anon?
channel.description:
Starting tomorrow we all know the DOJ is going to go full retard.
Is there anyway of remaining safe? I currently use a linux os then VM whonix. This is unbelievable that we cant be on the web freely.

item.title: Best way to stay anon?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Our extensive documentation should include pretty much all information necessary to stay reasonably anonymous: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Documentation

Have a nice day,

Ego
